english.segment1: I don't want You just because I need You. I don't want You just because You make my life complete. I don't want You in light of what You have for me. I want you simply because..
english.segment2: CHORUS. More than anyone else. I love You more. I love You more. Than life itself. I want You more. I want You more
english.segment3: I know that You're the one that I need. I know that You're the one that makes my life complete. I know that great things are in store for me. But I want you simply because..
english.segment5: I'm searching, longing, willing and wanting. You leave me needing more. Hold me, make me, change me, take me. I'm completely Yours
english.segment7: I want You more. I need You more. I love You. I love You. I want You more. I need You more. I love You. I love You
